name: Accelerate Events - Endless Runner
description:
An Endless runner tutorial made during our Accelerate Events nights. This is the Construct 3 file we made together. To customize your own game follow these steps.
1) Click the download button bellow

2) Click this Link : https://editor.construct.net/?startTour

3) On the Construct page Click "Open" then "File"

4) Find the "Endless Runner" file in your downloads

5) Have fun and change your game around
